website_summaries.verdict: Well-designed case that has cutouts in just the right places to match the size of this smartphone.
pros: Combines an inner frame of shock absorbing rubber with a hard plastic shell to create a nice level of protection
Rubber parts are available in 3 color options: black, blue, or white – differs from the look of other smartphone cases
cons: Clear design will show dust and smudges

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. My S8+ fell off the roof of my car onto tarmac wearing this case, landed flat, completely face down, not a scratch. Great quality, great price. 12/26/17 Update. Still fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Major Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. Soft CPU . Looks fantastic on the phone. It fits great. I have a d brand skin on my phone and it shows off the look of it nicely. Can't recommend this enough. Especiallyfor 8 dollars. People spending 40 or 50 bucks on otter box are really wasting their money when there are so many more cheaper and much better options.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Clear, clean loks
customer_reviews.text: snapped right into place, looks like the bumpers on all four corners will withstand a goodly shock -- my last S8 screen cracked completely after being dropped no more than two feet to the floor -- and the buttons all work flawlessly. Access to all important bits of the phone are there, and best of all, my wireless charger doesn't mind it being in place at all.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bey

customer_reviews.title: The case came to my phone's rescue
customer_reviews.text: It happened. I dropped my phone. As I watched my phone fall out of my hands, my case came to the rescue and gave cushion so the phone could bounce around a bit. I picked it up, and my phone was the way it was before I dropped it. Wonderful case!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it, not rigid enough but very good. Very screen protective friendly. Just doesn't get that grip but overall nice
customer_reviews.author: DarlingB

customer_reviews.title: It protects the phone and does a very good job doing so
customer_reviews.text: It protects the phone and does a very good job doing so, but is not scratch resistant. The back of the case is full of scratches and after a couple of months it will look old and ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Silva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you would expect for being cheap
customer_reviews.text: This phone case sucks. It didn't protect my phone against a foot drop on to a tile floor. Go elsewhere for a case
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE case. Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: REALLY NICE case. Fits perfect. I hope it works to protect my phone since about 80% of Galaxy 8+ phones have broken screens.
customer_reviews.author: MAD MAX

customer_reviews.title: Good case.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the phone well, even with the curved glass and glass protector. Color makes finding it in my purse a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are great cases. I purchased a second one as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek!
customer_reviews.text: Case is nice and sleek, unlike a lot of the bulkier cases I have bought in the past. I have dropped my phone a time or two with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Educator

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty nice case. Descent price. Seems like it'll offer some protection if I drop my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rami Yoakum

customer_reviews.title: This case feels very nice in the hands like it will definitely protect my ...
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed a case for my replacement device after cracking the screen on my old one again. This case feels very nice in the hands like it will definitely protect my phone from a drop. And it is clear, so it shows the "natural beauty" that my phone has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice case at a goodnight price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case at a goodnight price. Looks good and is relatively small but still feels safe.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Cracked my phone because the "cushioning" around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Cracked my phone because the "cushioning" around the corners is so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bogan

customer_reviews.title: I just love this case fits perfect my Samsung Galaxy s8 plus ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love this case fits perfect my Samsung Galaxy s8 plus and i print a picture of my 3 kids and since is clear looks great
customer_reviews.author: ana coc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case, been using for months now and phone still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Wrigglesworth Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Product shows off the color of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money. Nice slim fit, looks good and seems to provide good protection given the slimness.
customer_reviews.author: Dave E

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this case. I love that is clear and it protects my phone really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like the case
customer_reviews.text: We like the case. The case give you grip and protection while showcasing the beauty of the phone. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice look and feel. Just hoping it retains its clarity over time.
customer_reviews.author: Rod62wm

customer_reviews.title: ATHENS GA. CLIENT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent S8 PLUS CASE. NO PROBLEMS THUS FAR. FITS MY PHONE TO THE T.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have received on part and am still waiting for the receive the other two part!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Took A 3.5 Foot Drop Face First Like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely without being too bulky. I accidentally dropped my phone off a 3.5 foot tall hallway table face first onto a tile floor and it the case took it like a champ - no cracks! Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Cheap, and Does What It Should
customer_reviews.text: I like the case, it protects my phone exactly the way it should. And I love that it's clear so I can still display the color of my phone without it being hidden behind a black bulky case. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because the covers over the buttons (Volume Up, Volume Down, Bixby, and Power) are much harder to press than I would like or anticipated. Not sure if it's because the sides are fully tight over the edges or the plastic is just too new still, but it is a bit annoying. Not a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case. Shows the true beauty of the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case. Shows the true beauty of the phone without sacrificing protection... Next best thing to a bumper case. Stays clear (doesn't yellow), and really is scratch resistant... Barely a scuff after months of every day usage in and out of my pockets. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kabro

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND THIS CASE
customer_reviews.text: very strong, secure rubber around the edges for drop protection I like that it is clear you will need to get a screen protector because if it falls face down the case is thin and I don't think it will protect it. overall it comfortable in the hand, looks great, functions as it should
customer_reviews.author: Chicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, not bulky and big aux hole
customer_reviews.text: Bought several different cases at once and ended up choosing this one over them all. Durable, extra corner protection, not bulky and big enough hole for a fat aux cord. Ended up buying a second one of these cases because I liked it so much. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FoxSoap

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: This is a good case it protects the phone well. I like that is has the harder TPU vs the TPC plastic which is much softer. This way the case doesn't pop off when you reach for it in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeDAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Good solid case
customer_reviews.text: Good solid case. Absorbers on the sides with a firm backing. Works well with Tempered Glass protection for display. Crystal clear so maintains beauty of the device.
customer_reviews.author: OMG! It's me

customer_reviews.title: Bestest case
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the smallest case possible. This gel case fits perfectly and makes the buttons easier to push and is very light weight my gives you a firm grip.
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: Great product. ?but?
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but if have to remove it to reposition again you start to lose tackyness on the side that goes against the face of the phone..Had to reposition it twice now the covers just about stays in place..eventually it will fall of hopefully I will notice when it falls off...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P Petrelli

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great see thru case. I’ve dropped my phone twice only 2-3 feet but it was fine .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, but not so rigid as to be liable to crack. Good value for very little money
customer_reviews.author: Sgarb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money because of it's high quality and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, won't be dissapointed. Note: It's a little thick though, but very protective.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjan Bangalore Seetharama

customer_reviews.title: A bit slippery, but it does its job
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for a couple of months now and dropped it on hard surfaces a few times. However, I find that I drop it often because the case isn't very grippy. It also has started to yellow a bit, but not so much that the phone looks filthy.
customer_reviews.author: Tinuks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slim fit and protects my phones edges well for such a slim case.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: it feels massive enough to give good protection, problem is buttons are hard to press ...
customer_reviews.text: it feels massive enough to give good protection, problem is buttons are hard to press (especially power button). I gave it a week try, thought buttons will loosen a bit, but no... for this reason only i put this case aside and used another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great protection for my Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: So far product works well, great protection for my Galaxy S8.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a great price! Will use this vendor again!! I need 9 more words...... this case is very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Mclinn

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the phone is already big enough...
customer_reviews.text: Good, cheap product. However, it makes the already large S8+ a lot bigger. But I guess that's unavoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

product_meta.title: Galaxy S8 Plus Case, MoKo Crystal Clear TPU Bumper Gel Case Shockproof TPE Edge + Rigid PC Hard Back Cover for Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus 6.2 Inch (2017) - Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueMoKo Premium Protective Clear Case For Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus, You're Worth It. 

Transparent Slim Design 
Provides crystal clear vision of your phone's original look and style. Lightweight design allows for minimal bulk in your bag or pocket.

High-grade Material 
Dynamic combination of anti-scratch polycarbonate + shock absorbent TPU + flexible TPE materials for reinforced toughness.

Raised Bezel Protection 
Raised lips shield your phone camera and touchscreen from unnecessary scratches by lifting off flat surface when placed face down. 

TPU Bumper Cushion 
Bumper cushion around 4 corners offer shockproof protection from the impact of accidental falls or drops. No longer need to worry about damage to your phone. 

About MoKo 
MoKo is a top-rated brand on Amazon and a registered Trademark of BSCstore.
feature_bullets: ✦ Extra Protection - Colored flexible rubber inner frame provides extra cushion for shock-absorption and crush resistance to safeguard the phone.
✦ Sturdy Structure - TPU bumper border with 4 raised corners + rigid PC clear back panel offer full protection around the device.
✦ Considerate Design - Elevated bezels and corners keep the screen and camera from scratching or touching the ground.
✦ Precise Cutouts - Precise cutouts give full access to ports, speakers and camera; tactile buttons provide you with an original responsive control.
✦ Minimalist Style - Minimalism at its best. Crystal clear back cover perfectly fit your phone. Easy snap-on installation and quick removal without scuff.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
